data.subject: Street Fighting Man (Live)
data.lyric:
Ev'rywhere I hear the sound of marching, charging feet, boy
 Cause summer's here and the time is rig

data.subject: Rip This Joint (Live)
data.lyric:
Mama says yes, Papa says no
 Make up you mind 'cause I gotta go
 I'm gonna raise hell at the Union H

data.subject: Gimme Shelter (Live)
data.lyric:
Oh, a storm is threat'ning
 My very life today
 If I don't get some shelter
 Oh yeah, I'm gonna fade
